GSD.product_version: versions from v4.14 to before v5.19.4
GSD.description:
apparmor: fix reference count leak in aa_pivotroot()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.19.4 by commit 3ca40ad7afae144169a43988ef1a3f16182faf0a, it was introduced in version v4.14 by commit 2ea3ffb7782a84da33a8382f13ebd016da50079b. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: apparmor: fix reference count leak in aa_pivotroot()
